website_summaries.verdict: Cooling memory foam mattress that boasts both breathability and waterproof design.
pros: Parents love this two-stage mattress' cool feel and woven cover
A softer option, made from memory foam gel with hypoallergenic core
Lightweight and easy to lift for changing sheets
Toddler side is topped with a layer of soybean gel memory foam for added comfort
cons: Check to make sure the binding is in good shape – some customers reported problems
Some found the infant side too soft

customer_reviews.title: I Was disappointed in how soft both sides are compared to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this expecting it it be the same as the Sealy 2 stage mattress I got for my son 2 years ago. I Was disappointed in how soft both sides are compared to the previously purchased mattress. Not something u would have purchased for my newborn. Turns out the other mattress was a "Cool Beginnings" and this is "OptiCool" . Apparently Cool Beginnings can't be found. Luckily I have the ability to switch the two so my newborn has the more firm mattress. I feel overall, this is a good product, just much softer than I would have preferred for a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: ditzylitzy

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: Giving 5 stars because we've had no issues. It's a toddler mattress like any other and I know a lot of people have some heated opinions about them, but we are pretty low-stress parents. I think it keeps him cool because he usually sweat a lot when he sleeps. I keep the house pretty cool though.
customer_reviews.author: Shara ChesTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My 3. 5 month old slept in her rock ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 month old slept in her rock and play up until about a month and a half ago. Since then she's been faithfully sleeping in her crib every night. After a month and a half of use, it already has a big sagging part in the center where she sleeps.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Our infant loves his bed!! The mattress came ...
customer_reviews.text: Our infant loves his bed!! The mattress came with a little weirdness in the stitching on the edges, but it hasn't presented any issues (wasn't worth it to me to send back). Our little boy has slept well on this since 2 months old (he's 8.5 months now, and we still have no complaints).
customer_reviews.author: Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mattress, I wish I would have bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mattress, I wish I would have bought this for my first one as well! Totally worth the money!!! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte K.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy It
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old son has been sleeping in his crib for about a month now, and this mattress already has a huge indention in the middle. No amount of flipping or fluffing is working. I will be buying a different mattress soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps like a baby!
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress! He sleeps like a baby! Fit the crib perfectly. Nice and light, easy to change the sheet.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: We bought one 2 years ago for our first daughter & she loved it so when we had our second we bought her one too & they both sleep like princesses!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Has held up well! Slightly noisy but not too bad with a proper cover.
customer_reviews.text: Has held up well. Slightly noisy but not too bad with a proper mattress cover. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Kremer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Not too soft, not too firm. Love Sealy.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton Song

customer_reviews.title: Not a good mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress sunk in and was never comfortable for my child to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay2e

customer_reviews.title: Firm and still very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this twice. One for my home and one for her room at my parents’ home. She loves this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: P Louis

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it’s defective but very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress dips a lot on the infant side! Not sure if it’s defective but very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  buy
customer_reviews.text: My little one is quite the sweaty baby.... this has helped him tremendously
customer_reviews.author: Kev Davis

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot and I needed a mattress that was sturdy, comfortable and keep him cool while he slept
customer_reviews.text: My grandson sweats a lot and I needed a mattress that was sturdy, comfortable and keep him cool while he slept. I looked over what seemed like hundreds of mattresses and found the Sealy Opticol 2 Stage infant/toddler mattress. My grandson now sleeps cool and comfortable with his new mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Teri M.

customer_reviews.title: Middle sags/sinks in
customer_reviews.text: 3 months in and the middle sags. I now have to buy a different mattress. Waste of $100
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously soft for infant
customer_reviews.text: Product is way too soft to safely be used by infant. Even toddler side is very soft and my 20 month old sinks into it. Very dangerous and huge SIDS risk. Not happy with this productat all. Unfortunately, I cannot return this product because return window had passed by the time my 3 month old was ready to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica McGriff

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: This should NOT be considered an infant (or even a toddler) mattress. It is incredibly soft. Infant mattresses should be firm and this is NOT at all. Unfortunately, like many parents I bought this in preparation for my newborn who didn’t actually use the bed until months later so the return date had passed. I ended up giving it to my toddler (and having my 4 month old sleep on my toddlers old mattress) and now my toddler (3) is complaining of back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Polte

customer_reviews.title: It got saggy really fast, even on the infant/firm ...
customer_reviews.text: It got saggy really fast, even on the infant/firm dude. In the first month there is a concave in the middle. Our daughter is only 16 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S Siracusa II

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard, not too soft...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is way better than the mattress we previously had for my 2 year old. We moved him from his crib to a "big boy bed" and needed to replace the mattress. Because we are potty training, we wanted to get something protestant. The last mattress we had was so stiff and this one is a good transition into softer mattresses - something you don't want with super little babies. Not too hard, not too soft...
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Way too flexible - not safe for an infant imo
customer_reviews.text: I am not at all thrilled by this mattress. in fact, I would have returned if my sister hadn't opened it and set it up for me before I really looked at it. I tried to put a sheet on this mattress and it folded in half - I picked this one specifically because of the cool gel living in the desert and also because it specified the infant side was firmer. It may be firmer than the other side but that is not saying much. It is about as firm as a pack n play mattress... which is to say, not at all. I would not recommend this unless it was for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice crib mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice crib mattress. It's the perfect firmness and the cotton cover is soft, even though it's waterproof and very easy to clean. The two-sided design is great, too. One side is firmer (for infants) and the other side is softer (for toddlers). What a great idea! It saves you from having to replace the mattress as your child gets older. I also like the fact that this mattress is made in the USA. Add to that a lifetime warranty on workmanship and materials and you can't go wrong. Sealy knows sleep, and this mattress is just another example of their quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Deanokat

customer_reviews.title: It is by far the highest quality and most comfortable mattress we've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This Sealy mattress is our 3rd for 4 children. It is by far the highest quality and most comfortable mattress we've ever had. Others were Safety 1st brand spring coil mattress with similar firm/soft sides. The material makes the mattress feel totally different. All of our other mattresses have been changed away from coils and I thought that it would be good to swap for our latest addition as well. I appreciate that the firm side is still soft enough without creating a dip. This is the mattress that is definitely an upgrade from coils. By far, worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Loves Books

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for a toddler mattress
customer_reviews.text: In a totally unscientific study, my toddler has gone from waking up 2-3 times a night to sleeping through. Is it the mattress? Maybe? This mattress fit perfectly into the crib/toddler bed combo that we have. It is much more comfortable than the waterproof mattress we were previously using, and seems just as effective at keeping the stains out. Nothing cosmic about this mattress, just good quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Strawn

customer_reviews.title: Neutral Smell and 51.63 x 27.25 x 5.25" Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions of this mattress are exactly 51.63 x 27.25 x 5.25 in inches. That means that it's much smaller than a twin and sized for most but not all cribs. I was worried that it would be too thin and smooshy, allowing for contact with the hard underside of the crib. So I tested it out on our kitchen table, sitting on it, and it's strong enough to support my weight. So it's not just thin foam or anything. It's an actual mattress. Seems like high quality to me. Does NOT SMELL LIKE PLASTIC like a previous one that we had.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a great crib mattress. It's a bit on the firm side, which is good for baby. It wipes down easily, but doesn't feel cold, like the other mattress we had. It doesn't creak or make any noises at all. It fits well into our standard crib, and also fits well into a toddler bed. Overall, this is a very high quality, nice crib mattress
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was perfect it was firm and exactly what needed to be in a crib for a baby. Even though it was hyper allergenic we also put a cover over it for our own personal reasons to help keep out any dust. It was a great value for what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Purgatory

product_meta.title: Sealy Baby OptiCool 2-Stage Dual Firmness Waterproof Standard Toddler & Baby Crib Mattress - Lightweight Soybean Cool Gel Memory Foam, 51.7” x 27.3"
product_meta.description: The Sealy Opticool 2-Stage Crib Mattress and Toddler Mattress offers lightweight spring-free luxury, with an all-foam product made with soybean cool gel memory foam and a hypoallergenic core. A waterproof surface makes this crib mattress easy-clean while the breathable cotton cover enhances sleeping comfort. Firm construction on the infant mattress side and softer organic cotton cushioning on the toddler side makes the Sealy Opticool 2-Stage the perfect baby mattress from infancy through the toddler years. Cool silvery white cotton cover is breathable on baby's skin while remaining easy-clean. Waterproof and allergen barrier layer keeps liquids from seeping inside. The cotton fabric cover is woven for durability and is pvc.-free. Measures 51.63” x 27.25” x 5.25” and fits both USA standard size cribs and toddler beds. Sealy is the leader in sleep technology and the best-selling crib mattress brand in North America and proudly supports infants and toddlers with industry-leading crib mattresses known for safety, quality, comfort and premium support. This crib mattress passes all the latest ASTM crib mattress standards including proper crib fit. Meets the Children’s Safe Products Act and Chemicals of High Concern to Children regulations as introduced by states like Washington and Vermont, among others. Pass CPSIA testing for lead and phthalates and each component is air quality tested for a healthier indoor environment. This mattress is GREENGUARD Gold Certified, tested for harmful chemical emissions at an independent laboratory. Sealy crib mattresses are made in the USA and backed with a Lifetime warranty on all workmanship and materials. Use for infants and toddlers approximately 0-5 years.
feature_bullets: DUAL FIRMNESS -- Features a two-stage design with firmer infant side and a softer toddler side - just flip the mattress over for a soybean cool gel memory foam topper for cool comfort for infants or toddlers.
SPRING-FREE FOAM CRIB MATTRESS -- Offers lightweight spring-free luxury with an all-foam crib mattress made with soybean cool gel memory foam and a firm hypoallergenic core.

LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN -- A firm and lightweight hypoallergenic core creates firmness perfect for infants and newborns. This mattress weighs less than 12 pounds to easily lift and change crib sheets and mattress pads.

BREATHABLE WOVEN COVER -- Cool silvery white cotton cover is breathable on baby's skin, while remaining waterproof and easy-clean. All our mattresses are tested for flame retardant chemicals and we do not add flame retardant chemicals.
MADE IN THE USA -- Sealy Crib and Toddler Mattresses are designed, engineered and proudly made in the USA of U.S. and imported parts. Lifetime warranty on workmanship and materials.
PERFECT FIT -- Measures 51.7” x 27.3" and fits both USA standard size cribs and toddler beds. Beds, Bed frames and Foundations sold separately.

AWARD WINNING BRAND -- More babies sleep on a Sealy than any other crib mattress brand in the USA. As the manufacturer, we stand behind all our products with great customer service and support. If there is anything we can do to help you, please let us know.
